body.p: This is the start page for the technical documentation of Giellatekno and Divvun. It is written mainly for ourselves, and now and then quite internal, but we try to make it understandable for others as well. Have a look!

section.title: Links

li.a: The structure of the technical documentation (TechDoc)
A list of our documentation pages for different projects
Don't Panic! -- a page containing the commands you need in case of a crisis

section.p: Remember that you may also use the search function in the upper right corner of this page.
